MinimalUI.LogoBehaviourHint: Use the Foundry Logo to toggle visual elements (when visible, of course).
MinimalUI.LogoBehaviourToggleNoChat: Logo toggles Hide ALL UI except Chat
MinimalUI.HidePlayerCameraHint: For player camera/audio, whether only to show GMs
MinimalUI.ControlsBehaviourHint: Choose whether left panel is always visible or auto hides
MinimalUI.ControlsStyleHint: Choose whether to expand to the right or keep a single column of buttons
MinimalUI.ControlsPositionHint: Choose favorite side panel position. Will be ignored if using 'Keep a single column' style.
MinimalUI.HotbarStyleHint: Customize Hotbar UI. Auto-Hide Ignored when using Custom Hotbar module.
MinimalUI.HotbarPositionHint: Horizontal position of the Macro Hotbar
MinimalUI.HotbarPPositionHint: Horizontal position in pixels. If Macro Position is 'Manual'
MinimalUI.NavigationStyleHint: Customize scene navigation behaviour. Consider 'DF Scene Enhancement' when hidden.
MinimalUI.NavigationSizeHint: Customize scene navigation Size, when visible.
MinimalUI.PlayersSizeHint: Choose between standard size or the small version.
MinimalUI.SidebarStyleHint: Whether the right side panel starts collapsed or not
MinimalUI.BorderColorHint: Color of borders for sidebars and buttons
MinimalUI.ShadowColorHint: Color for shadows around borders and buttons
MinimalUI.ShadowStrengthHint: How gloomy and shadow are the borders? Default: 5
MinimalUI.DynamicUIHint: Auto hides UI elements after 60 seconds of chat inactivity when controlling tokens or changing scenes.
